documentation.text:
@title ZKBehaviorAuditor
 @notice Anonymous behavior auditing with ZK proofs
 
 PRIVACY:
 - Report anomalies without revealing reporter
 - Audit entities without exposing their actions
 - Prove suspicious behavior without details
 - Anonymous whistleblowing

@title ZKEmergencyShutdown
 @notice Privacy-preserving emergency controls
 
 FEATURES:
 - Anonymous emergency triggers
 - Private anomaly reporting
 - Hidden vulnerability disclosures
 - Confidential guardian votes

@title ZKEntityBridge
 @notice Bridge OAN entities between L1 and L2 (ZKSync)
 
 FEATURES:
 - Deposit entities to ZKSync
 - Withdraw entities to L1
 - Maintain state consistency
 - Prove entity ownership with ZK proofs
@notice Deposit entity from L1 to L2
@notice Initiate withdrawal from L2 to L1
@notice Check if entity is on L2

@title ZKLayer7Integration
 @notice Bridge between Layer 7 safety and ZKSync privacy
 
 FEATURES:
 - Validate ZK proofs before L7 actions
 - Private reputation checks for L7 enforcement
 - Anonymous slashing via ZK proofs
 - Emergency circuit breaker with privacy

@notice Validate action with ZK proof (privacy-preserving)
 @dev Proves entity meets requirements WITHOUT revealing details
@notice Check if entity meets threshold privately

@title ZKMarketplace
 @notice Private marketplace on ZKSync with hidden prices
 
 PRIVACY:
 - Buyers and sellers remain anonymous
 - Sale prices hidden
 - Trading volumes obfuscated
 - Reputation-gated access without revealing reputation
@notice Execute private sale with ZK proof

@title ZKReputationOracle
 @notice Private reputation system using ZK proofs
 
 PRIVACY FEATURES:
 - Prove reputation threshold without revealing exact score
 - Anonymous reputation updates
 - Confidential reputation history
 - Zero-knowledge range proofs

@notice Verify reputation proof
 @dev Simplified - real implementation would use actual ZK proof verification
@notice Prove reputation is within range WITHOUT revealing exact value
@notice Check if entity meets reputation threshold (privately)

@title ZKSlashing
 @notice Anonymous slashing with privacy
 
 FEATURES:
 - Slash without revealing who got slashed
 - Prove violation without details
 - Anonymous stake management
 - Private penalty tracking
@notice Get global slashing stats (aggregated for privacy)

@title ZKVoting
 @notice Anonymous voting with ZK proofs
 
 FEATURES:
 - Prove eligibility without revealing identity
 - Anonymous vote casting
 - Verifiable tallying
 - Prevent double voting
